headline.main: NAZIS BEATEN BACK IN KUBAN CLASHES; Russians Report Germans Fail With Heavy Losses in Strong Caucasus Counter-Blows BERLIN CLAIMS A VILLAGE Soviet Airmen Raid Junctions and Harry Supply Lines -- Donets Sectors Active

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Wednesday, June 2 (AP) -- Thrusts by air, artillery and ground troops spurred action on the Russian front yesterday, bringing death to nearly 1,000 Germans, the midnight Soviet communique reported today, while a news broadcast told of sharp engagements in the Caucasus in which Nazi counter-attacks were beaten back.
